mapper.select: SELECT EMP_NO, GIVE01, GIVE02, GIVE03, GIVE04, GIVE05, GIVE06, GIVE07, GIVE08, GIVE09, GIVE10, GIVE11, GIVE12, GIVE13, GIVE14, GIVE15, GIVE16, GIVE17, TAKE01, TAKE02, TAKE03, TAKE04, TAKE05, TAKE06, TAKE07, TAKE08, AUDIT_ID FROM T_HC5300 WHERE EMP_NO = #{EMP_NO}

SELECT A.EMP_NO AS EMP_NO, A.ITEM_GB AS ITEM_GB, A.ITEM_CD AS ITEM_CD, A.STA_DATE AS STA_DATE, A.END_DATE AS END_DATE, A.GIVETAKE_AMT AS GIVETAKE_AMT, A.AUDIT_ID AS AUDIT_ID, B.ITEM_NM AS ITEM_NM FROM T_HC5500 A, T_HC5200 B WHERE A.EMP_NO = #{EMP_NO} AND A.ITEM_GB = B.ITEM_GB AND A.ITEM_CD = B.ITEM_CD

SELECT MAX(A.EMP_NO) EMP_NO, MAX(A.DEPT_NM) DEPT_NM, MAX(A.JIKGUP_NM) JIKGUP_NM, MAX(ISNULL(B.KOR_NM,C.KOR_NM)) KOR_NM, MAX(A.PAY_GB) PAY_GB, SUM(A.PAYTOT) PAYTOT, SUM(A.BIKWAT) BIKWAT, SUM(A.KWASET) KWASET, SUM(A.SODUK_TAX) SODUK_TAX, SUM(A.JUMIN_TAX) JUMIN_TAX, SUM(A.H_INSURE) H_INSURE, SUM(A.PENSION) PENSION, SUM(A.E_INSURE) E_INSURE, SUM(A.CHAGAM) CHAGAM, MAX(A.PAY_DT) PAY_DT FROM T_HM5000 A, T_HM1000 B, T_HM1000_T C WHERE A.EMP_NO *= B.EMP_NO AND A.EMP_NO *= C.EMP_NO AND (A.PAY_YYMM = #{PAY_YYMM} AND A.DEPT_NM LIKE '%'+#{DEPT_NM}+'%' AND (B.KOR_NM LIKE '%'+#{KOR_NM}+'%' AND C.KOR_NM LIKE '%'+#{KOR_NM}+'%')) GROUP BY A.EMP_NO, A.PAY_YYMM, A.DEPT_CD ORDER BY A.DEPT_CD ASC

SELECT DEPT_CD, DEPT_NM, JIKGUP_CD, JIKGUP_NM, EMP_NO, KOR_NM, PAY_01, PAY_02, PAY_03, PAY_04, PAY_05, PAY_06, PAY_07, PAY_08, PAY_09, PAY_10, PAY_11, PAY_12, COLOR , GUBUN, (PAY_01 + PAY_02 + PAY_03 + PAY_04 + PAY_05 + PAY_06 + PAY_07 + PAY_08 + PAY_09 + PAY_10 + PAY_11 + PAY_12) AS PAY_TOT FROM SF_H51_0280_SL1 (#{PAY_YYMM},'000010', 'Z20000') WHERE DEPT_NM LIKE '%'+#{DEPT_NM}+'%' AND KOR_NM LIKE '%'+#{KOR_NM}+'%' ORDER BY DEPT_CD, JIKGUP_CD, EMP_NO
